job_title: Clinical Trial Assistant in Durham, NC

review_title: zero training, poor management, archaic technology
job_title: Clinical Research Nurse in Durham, NC
pros: none... it's a job that you'll want to start applying to other jobs as soon as you start
cons: insanely long hiring process, poor communication overall, virtually no training given, poor management/oversight, unclear expectations, insurance was a nightmare

job_title: Clinical Research Coordinator in Durham, NC
pros: Flexibility in working hours. Reasonable deadlines and supervisors.
cons: PI's aren't local. Silo-like structure within the group. Location of office space is in a basement with little or no windows in offices.
